Package domain

Class Recommendation

java.lang.Object
domain.Recommendation
public class Recommendation extends Object
Class Recommendation. This class represents a set of items given to a specific user, which are shown to the user to valorate. the maximum number of objects of this class to exist are the number of active users registered in the system.
Author:
Guillem Gonz√°lez Valdivia

  • Field Details

    • Items

      private ArrayList<Integer> Items

    • user

      private Integer user
      Attribute user. Default value = -1 (there's no user holding this recommendation at the moment). A non negative integer that represents the user owner of this recommendation. It is also the identifier of the class. Some valid examples can be 2, 6782 or 91837. An invalid example could be -172.

    • DCG

      private Double DCG
      Attribute DCG. Default value = 0.0. A real, non negative number, that gives the quality of the recommendation, related to other valuations of the system where it is. If the DCG is bigger, the quality of the recommendation is better. Some valid examples can be 12, 123.4 or 2.45. An invalid example can be -123,4.

  • Constructor Details

    • Recommendation

      public Recommendation()
      Constructor Recommendation(). Creates an empty recommendation, with all attributes with default values. It has no parameters.

    • Recommendation

      public Recommendation(Integer user)
      Constructor Recommendation(). Creates an almost empty recommendation. The only attribute set is the identifier (user).
      Parameters:
      user - The identifier and the user which owns the recommendation.

    • Recommendation

      public Recommendation(Integer user, ArrayList<Integer> items)
      Constructor Recommendation(). Creates a filled recommendation, with its identifier and its items.
      Parameters:
      user - The idenfiticator and the user which owns the recommendation.
      items - The arraylist of items that go into the recommendation.

    • Recommendation

      public Recommendation(String data)
      Constructor Recommendation(). Creates a recommendation from a string, which contains all the information needed to define the attributes.
      Parameters:
      data - A string that contains the values to create a full new recommendation.

      public String toString()
      Constructor toString(). Creates a string, container of all the information of this recommendation (identifier, DCG and items).

      s String that contains the attributes of the recommendation, separated by "¬¨" (dollars).

      public Integer getId()
      Method getId(). Returns the identifier of the recommendation, which is also the identifier of the user owner of the recommendation.
      Returns:
      userId The identifier of the recommendation.

      public Integer getUser()
      Method getUser(). Returns the identifier of the owner of this recommendation.
      Returns:
      userId The identifier of the recommendation.

    • getDCG

      public Double getDCG()
      Method getDCG(). Returns the result of applying the calculation for the value of some recommendation, in a given system with valuations.
      Returns:

    • getItems

      Method getItems(). Returns the array of identifiers of items of which set up this recommendation.

      items The array of items of the recommendation.

    • setId

      public void setId(Integer user)
      Method setId(). Sets the identifier of the recommendation with a new value, given by parameter.
      Parameters:
      user - The identifier of the recommendation, which is also the identifier of the user owner.

    • setUser

      public void setUser(Integer user)
      Method setUser(). Sets the identifier of the user owner of this recommendation.
      Parameters:
      user - The identifier of the user that will be the new owner of this recommendation.

    • setDCG

      public void setDCG(Double DCG)
      Method setDCG(). Sets the DCG of the recommendation.
      Parameters:

    • setItems

      public void setItems(ArrayList<Integer> items)
      Method setItems(). Sets the items of which this recommendation will be made of.
      Parameters:
      items - An array of identifiers of the items that set up the recommendation.

    • addItem

      public void addItem(Integer item)
      Method addItem() Adds an item, given by its identifier, to the end of the array of items.
      Parameters:
      item - An identifier of an already existing item.

    • intersection

      public static Recommendation intersection(Recommendation A, Recommendation B)
      Static method intersection(). Calculates the intersection of this recommendation and the one given by parameter (set intersection operation). The operation consists of finding the items that are in both recommendations.
      Parameters:
      A - First recommendation.
      B - Second recommendation.
      Returns:
      I The intersection of the two recommendations A and B.

    • union

      public static Recommendation union(Recommendation A, Recommendation B)
      Static method union(). Calculates the union of this recommendation and the one given by parameter (set operation). The operation consists of adding the items that appear in one recommendation or both (set union operation).
      Parameters:
      A - First recommendation.
      B - Second recommendation.
      Returns:
      U The union of the two recommendations A and B.
